item.title: Sorcerer Offsec Walkthrough
item.description:
Sorcerer OffSec Walkthrough Link to heading

1. Introduction Link to heading

This walkthrough documents the compromise of the Sorcerer machine from CyberSecLabs (CFT). We compromised the Sorcerer machine through classic multi-surface enumeration: multiple web servers, exposed ZIP archives leaking Tomcat credentials and SSH keys, restricted SSH bypass through editing authorized_keys, and final privilege escalation via a misconfigured SUID start-stop-daemon binary (GTFOBins). Result: full root compromise, highlighting weak service isolation, exposed sensitive files, and dangerous privilege configurations.
